name: Mutare

levels.Ⅰ:
:instant: Your selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains +1 :attack:

— OR —

:instant: Your selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains +1 :defense:

This effect doubles for a Dragons [unit](../units/index.md).
levels.Ⅳ:
:ongoing: For this Combat, your selected [unit's](../units/index.md) :health_points: is increased by 1.

This effect doubles for a Dragons [unit](../units/index.md).
levels.Ⅵ:
:ongoing: For this Combat, your selected [unit's](../units/index.md) :initiative: is increased by 1.

This effect doubles for a Dragons [unit](../units/index.md).

appearances: Dragon’s Blood - 2. Blood Of The Dragon Father
